member.name: T:GroupDocs.Conversion.Config.ConversionConfig
member.summary: Instantiate this class to set conversion configuration

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Config.ConversionConfig.StoragePath
member.summary: Get or Set the conversion storage path

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Config.ConversionConfig.OutputPath
member.summary: Get or Set the conversion output path

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Config.ConversionConfig.LocalesPath
member.summary: Get or Set the location of the Locale files default: the same path where the conversion assembly is located

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Config.ConversionConfig.CachePath
member.summary: Get or Set the Conversion cache path

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Config.ConversionConfig.UseCache
member.summary: Set either the cache should be used or not

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Config.ConversionConfig.CacheTimeOut
member.summary: Cache timeout in minutes. Default value is 10.

member.name: T:GroupDocs.Conversion.Config.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The GroupDocs.Conversion.Config namespace provides classes for customizing GroupDocs.Conversion behaviour

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CadOptions.Width
member.summary: Set desired page width for converting CAD document

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CadOptions.Height
member.summary: Set desired page height for converting CAD document

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsOptions.ShowGridLines
member.summary: Show grid lines when converting Excel files

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsOptions.ShowHiddenSheets
member.summary: Show hidden sheets when converting Excel files

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsOptions.OnePagePerSheet
member.summary: If OnePagePerSheet is true the content of the sheet will be converted to one page in the PDF document. Default value is true.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsOptions.OptimizePdfSize
member.summary: If True and converting to Pdf the conversion is optimized for better file size than print quality

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsOptions.ConvertRange
member.summary: Convert specific range when converting to other than cells format. Example: "D1:F8"

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsOptions.SkipEmptyRowsAndColumns
member.summary: Skips empty rows and columns when converting. Default is True.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CsvLoadOptions.IsMultiEncoded
member.summary: True means the file contains several encodings

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CsvLoadOptions.HasFormula
member.summary: Indicates whether text is formula if it starts with "="

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CsvLoadOptions.ConvertNumericData
member.summary: Indicates whether the string in the file is converted to numeric. Default is True

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CsvLoadOptions.ConvertDateTimeData
member.summary: Indicates whether the string in the file is converted to date. Default is True

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfOptimizationOptions.CompressImages
member.summary: If CompressImages set to true, all images in the document are recompressed. The compression is defined by the ImageQuality property.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfOptimizationOptions.ImageQuality
member.summary: Value in percent where 100% is unchanged quality and image size. To decrease the image size, use ImageQuality less than 100

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfOptimizationOptions.UnembedFonts
member.summary: Make fonts not embedded if set to true

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfOptions.PdfFormat
member.summary: Set the pdf format of the converted document.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfOptions.Zoom
member.summary: Specifies the zoom level in percentage. Default is 100.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfOptions.Linearize
member.summary: Linearize PDF Document for the Web

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfOptions.Grayscale
member.summary: Convert a PDF from RGB colorspace to Grayscale

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.RtfOptions.ExportImagesForOldReaders
member.summary: Specifies whether the keywords for "old readers" are written to RTF or not. This can significantly affect the size of the RTF document. Default is False.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsLoadOptions.DefaultFont
member.summary: Default font for Cells document. The following font will be used if a font is missing.

member.name: T:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WordBookmarksOptions
member.summary: Options for handling Bookmarks in Word to PDF conversions

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WordBookmarksOptions.BookmarksOutlineLevel
member.summary: Specifies the default level in the document outline at which to display Word bookmarks. Default is 0. Valid range is 0 to 9.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WordBookmarksOptions.HeadingsOutlineLevels
member.summary: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the document outline. Default is 0. Valid range is 0 to 9.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WordBookmarksOptions.ExpandedOutlineLevels
member.summary: Specifies how many levels in the document outline to show expanded when the file is viewed. Default is 0. Valid range is 0 to 9. Note that this options will not work when saving to XPS.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WordsLoadOptions.DefaultFont
member.summary: Default font for Words document. The following font will be used if a font is missing.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.SlidesLoadOptions.DefaultFont
member.summary: Default font for rendering the presentation. The following font will be used if a presentation font is missing.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WebpOptions.Lossless
member.summary: Indicates if the compression of the converted file will be lossless

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.XmlLoadOptions.XslFo
member.summary: XSL document stream to convert XML-FO using XSL

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsSaveOptions.Password
member.summary: Set this property if you want to protect the converted document with a password

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.CellsSaveOptions.Zoom
member.summary: Specifies the zoom level in percentage. Default is 100.

member.name: T:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option namespace provides classes for customizing specific conversion

member.name: T:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WatermarkOptions
member.summary: Options for settings watermark to the converted document

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WatermarkOptions.Font
member.summary: Watermark font name if text watermark is applied

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WatermarkOptions.Color
member.summary: Watermark font color if text watermark is applied

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WatermarkOptions.Transparency
member.summary: Watermark transparency. Value between 0 and 1. Value 0 is fully visible, value 1 is invisible.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WatermarkOptions.Background
member.summary: Indicates that the watermark is stamped as background. If the value is true, the watermark is layed at the bottom. By default is false and the watermark is layed on top.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.HtmlSaveOptions.UsePdf
member.summary: If true, the input firstly is converted to PDF and after that to desired format

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.HtmlSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.HtmlSaveOptions.FixedLayout
member.summary: If true fixed layout will be used e.g. absolutely positioned html elements Default: true

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.HtmlSaveOptions.Zoom
member.summary: Specifies the zoom level in percentage. Default is 100.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.ImageSaveOptions.UsePdf
member.summary: If true, the input firstly is converted to PDF and after that to desired format

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.ImageSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.ImageSaveOptions.HorizontalResolution
member.summary: Desired image horizontal resolution after conversion. The default resolution is the resolution of the input file or 96dpi

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.ImageSaveOptions.VerticalResolution
member.summary: Desired image vertical resolution after conversion. The default resolution is the resolution of the input file or 96dpi

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.ImageSaveOptions.JpegQuality
member.summary: Desired image quality when converting to Jpeg. The value must be between 0 and 100. The default value is 100.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.LoadOptions.Password
member.summary: Set password to unprotect protected document

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.SaveOptions.ConvertPages
member.summary: Convert specific pages. The list contains the page indexes of the pages to be converted

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.SaveOptions.UsePdf
member.summary: If true, the input firstly is converted to PDF and after that to desired format

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.SaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.SaveOptions.HideWordTrackedChanges
member.summary: Hide markup and track changes for Word documents

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.SaveOptions.HideComments
member.summary: Hide comments during conversion if the source format support comments

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.SlidesSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.SlidesSaveOptions.Password
member.summary: Set this property if you want to protect the converted document with a password

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.SlidesSaveOptions.Zoom
member.summary: Specifies the zoom level in percentage. Default is 100. Default zoom is supported till Microsoft Powerpoint 2010. Starting from Microsoft Powerpoint 2013 default zoom is no longer set to document, instead it appears to use the zoom factor of the last document that was opened.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WordsSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WordsSaveOptions.Dpi
member.summary: Desired page DPI after conversion. The default resolution is: 96dpi

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WordsSaveOptions.Password
member.summary: Set this property if you want to protect the converted document with a password

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.WordsSaveOptions.Zoom
member.summary: Specifies the zoom level in percentage. Default is 100. Default zoom is supported till Microsoft Word 2010. Starting from Microsoft Word 2013 default zoom is no longer set to document, instead it appears to use the zoom factor of the last document that was opened.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.WordBookmarks
member.summary: If the input document is Word the conversion will handle the word bookmarks regarding this option. Use WordBookmarks to set desired behavior

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.Width
member.summary: Desired page width in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.Height
member.summary: Desired page height in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.Dpi
member.summary: Desired page DPI after conversion. The default resolution is: 96dpi

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.Password
member.summary: Set this property if you want to protect the converted document with a password

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.MarginTop
member.summary: Desired page top margin in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.MarginBottom
member.summary: Desired page bottom margin in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.MarginLeft
member.summary: Desired page left margin in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.MarginRight
member.summary: Desired page right margin in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Converter.Option.PdfSaveOptions.WordBookmarkOptions
member.summary: If the input document is Word the conversion will handle the word bookmarks regarding this option.
